summary: This is an email from attorney Brittany Henderson to Mandy (likely a prosecutor or investigator) regarding scheduling interviews for four additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein who are ready to speak. The email references a victim briefing in New York on October 23, 2019, and seeks to arrange meetings on October 23 or 24, 2019.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: The sender of the email, representing additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein and seeking to schedule interviews for them with the recipient.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Copied on the email, likely a colleague or co-counsel also involved in representing Epstein victims.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: The intended recipient of the email, to whom victim interviews are being offered regarding their experiences with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the victim interviews; the individuals represented are victims of Epstein.

connections.description: Henderson is communicating with Mandy to schedule victim interviews as part of an investigation or legal proceeding.
Edwards is copied on the email, indicating they are colleagues working together on victim representation.
Henderson represents victims of Jeffrey Epstein, placing her in an adversarial legal relationship with him.

events.title: Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: A victim briefing was scheduled to take place in New York, where four additional Epstein victims would be present.

events.title: Proposed Victim Interviews
events.description: Brittany Henderson proposed scheduling interviews with the four victims on October 23 or 24, 2019, following the victim briefing.

locations: 425 North Andrews Avenue, Suite 2, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33301
keyFacts: Four additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein were ready to speak with investigators as of October 2019.
A victim briefing was scheduled for October 23, 2019, in New York where these victims would be present.
Attorney Brittany Henderson was actively coordinating victim interviews with a prosecutor/investigator named Mandy.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative or legal proceedings related to Epstein victims after his death in August 2019.
